titles.title: Recognizing and supporting the efforts of the State of New York to develop the National Purple Heart Hall of Honor in New Windsor, New York, and for other purposes.
Recognizing and supporting the efforts of the State of New York to develop the National Purple Heart Hall of Honor in New Windsor, New York, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Total Force.

bill.summary: Recognizes and expresses support for efforts of the State of New York to develop the National Purple Heart Hall of Honor in New Windsor, New York.Encourages the people of the United States and Federal departments and agencies to participate in the development of such Hall.
